titles: The 10th day of Aprill 1655. A true report of the great number of poor children, and other poor people maintained in the severall hospitals by the pious care of the Lord Mayor, commonalty and citizens of the city of London.
notes: A report on Christ's hospital, St. Bartholomew's, St. Thomas's, Bridewell, and Bethlem.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
